 {% schema %}
 {

+  "name": "Somos Grid",
+  "tag": "section",
+  "class": "usp-section-wrapper",
+  "settings": [
+    { "type": "text", "id": "header_text", "label": "Title", "default": "Why Choose Us" },
+    { "type": "text", "id": "sub_text", "label": "Sub Text" },
+    {
+      "type": "range",
+      "id": "top_title_padding_bottom",

+      "min": 0,
+      "max": 100,
+      "step": 2,
+      "default": 0
+    },
+    {
+      "type": "color",
+      "id": "header_color",
+      "label": "Header Color",
+      "default": "#000000"
+    },
+    {
+      "type": "select",
+      "id": "header_alignment",
+      "label": "Header Alignment",
+      "default": "center",
+      "options": [
+        { "value": "left", "label": "Left" },
+        { "value": "center", "label": "Center" },
+        { "value": "right", "label": "Right" }
+      ]
+    },
+    {
+      "type": "select",
+      "id": "header_tag",
+      "label": "Header Tag",
+      "default": "h2",
+      "options": [
+        { "value": "h1", "label": "H1" },
+        { "value": "h2", "label": "H2" },
+        { "value": "h3", "label": "H3" },
+        { "value": "h4", "label": "H4" },
+        { "value": "h5", "label": "H5" },
+        { "value": "h6", "label": "H6" }
+      ]
+    },
+    {
+      "type": "select",
+      "id": "header_weight",
+      "label": "Header Weight",
+      "default": "600",
+      "options": [
+        { "value": "400", "label": "Normal" },
+        { "value": "600", "label": "Semi-bold" },
+        { "value": "700", "label": "Bold" }
+      ]
+    },
+    { "type": "image_picker", "id": "background_image", "label": "Background Image" },
+    { "type": "color", "id": "background_color", "label": "Background Color", "default": "#ffffff" },
+    { "type": "text", "id": "section_id", "label": "Section ID" },
+    { "type": "text", "id": "custom_class", "label": "Custom Class" },
+    {
+      "type": "select",
+      "id": "section_width",
+      "label": "Section Width",
+      "default": "standard",
+      "options": [
+        { "value": "standard", "label": "Standard" },
+        { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" }
+      ]
+    },
+    {
+      "type": "select",
+      "id": "section_content_width",
+      "label": "Content Width",
+      "default": "standard",
+      "options": [
+        { "value": "standard", "label": "Standard" },
+        { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" }
+      ]
+    },
+    { "type": "checkbox", "id": "show_on_desktop", "label": "Show on Desktop", "default": true },
+    { "type": "checkbox", "id": "show_on_tablet", "label": "Show on Tablet", "default": true },
+    { "type": "checkbox", "id": "show_on_mobile", "label": "Show on Mobile", "default": true },

commits.content:
{% if section.settings.header_text != blank %} <{{ section.settings.header_tag }} class="usp-header" style="text-align: {{ section.settings.header_alignment }}; color: {{ section.settings.header_color }}; font-weight: {{ section.settings.header_weight }};"> {{ section.settings.header_text }} {% endif %} {% if section.settings.sub_text != blank %}
{{ section.settings.sub_text }}
{% endif %}
{% for block in section.blocks %}
{% if block.settings.image != blank %} {% endif %} {% if block.settings.title != blank %} <{{ block.settings.title_tag }} style="color: {{ block.settings.title_color }}; font-weight: {{ block.settings.title_weight }};"> {{ block.settings.title }} {% endif %} {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
{{ block.settings.text }}
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}
{% schema %} { "name": "USP Accordion", "tag": "section", "class": "usp-section-wrapper", "settings": [ { "type": "text", "id": "header_text", "label": "Title", "default": "Why Choose Us" }, { "type": "select", "id": "header_tag", "label": "Header Tag", "default": "h2", "options": [ { "value": "h1", "label": "H1" }, { "value": "h2", "label": "H2" }, { "value": "h3", "label": "H3" }, { "value": "h4", "label": "H4" }, { "value": "h5", "label": "H5" }, { "value": "h6", "label": "H6" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "sub_text", "label": "Sub Text" }, { "type": "select", "id": "header_alignment", "label": "Header Alignment", "default": "center", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "color", "id": "header_color", "label": "Header Color", "default": "#000000" }, { "type": "select", "id": "header_weight", "label": "Header Font Weight", "default": "600", "options": [ { "value": "400", "label": "Normal" }, { "value": "600", "label": "Semi-bold" }, { "value": "700", "label": "Bold" } ] }, { "type": "image_picker", "id": "background_image", "label": "Background Image" }, { "type": "color", "id": "background_color", "label": "Background Color", "default": "#ffffff" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "show_on_desktop", "label": "Show on Desktop", "default": true }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "show_on_tablet", "label": "Show on Tablet", "default": true }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "show_on_mobile", "label": "Show on Mobile", "default": true }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_top", "min": 0, "max": 200, "default": 0, "label": "Padding Top (px)" }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_bottom", "min": 0, "max": 200, "default": 0, "label": "Padding Bottom (px)" }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_left", "min": 0, "max": 200, "default": 0, "label": "Padding Left (px)" }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_right", "min": 0, "max": 200, "default": 0, "label": "Padding Right (px)" }, { "type": "select", "id": "slider_mode", "label": "Layout Type", "default": "grid", "options": [ { "value": "grid", "label": "Grid" }, { "value": "slider", "label": "Carousel" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "custom_class", "label": "Custom Class" }, { "type": "text", "id": "section_id", "label": "Section ID" }, { "type": "range", "id": "height_desktop", "label": "Section Height (Desktop)", "min": 0, "max": 2000, "default": 0 }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_width", "label": "Section Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_content_width", "label": "Content Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] } ], "blocks": [ { "type": "usp", "name": "USP Block", "settings": [ { "type": "image_picker", "id": "image", "label": "Image" }, { "type": "range", "id": "image_width", "label": "Image Width (%)", "min": 10, "max": 100, "default": 60 }, { "type": "select", "id": "image_ratio", "label": "Image Ratio", "default": "auto", "options": [ { "value": "1 / 1", "label": "Square" }, { "value": "4 / 3", "label": "Landscape" }, { "value": "3 / 4", "label": "Portrait" }, { "value": "auto", "label": "Auto" } ] }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "lazy_load", "label": "Enable Lazy Loading", "default": true }, { "type": "select", "id": "hover_effect", "label": "Image Hover Effect", "default": "none", "options": [ { "value": "none", "label": "None" }, { "value": "hover-zoom", "label": "Zoom" }, { "value": "hover-grayscale", "label": "Grayscale" }, { "value": "hover-fade", "label": "Fade" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "title", "label": "Title" }, { "type": "select", "id": "title_tag", "label": "Title Tag", "default": "h3", "options": [ { "value": "h1", "label": "H1" }, { "value": "h2", "label": "H2" }, { "value": "h3", "label": "H3" }, { "value": "h4", "label": "H4" }, { "value": "h5", "label": "H5" }, { "value": "h6", "label": "H6" } ] }, { "type": "color", "id": "title_color", "label": "Title Color", "default": "#000" }, { "type": "select", "id": "title_weight", "label": "Title Weight", "default": "600", "options": [ { "value": "400", "label": "Normal" }, { "value": "600", "label": "Semi-bold" }, { "value": "700", "label": "Bold" } ] }, { "type": "richtext", "id": "text", "label": "Text" } ] } ], "presets": [ { "name": "USP Accordion", "category": "Somos Custom" } ] } {% endschema %}
